name: Ultimate Direction Access 600 Waistpack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Run free with just the essentials for the distance. This waist pack has a water bottle and a pocket to carry your phone.Includes a 600ml Flex Form ergonomic water bottle with silicone bite valve.Made of wicking mesh and ripstop nylon.Semi-flexible bottle sleeve has an angled cage and flared top for easy bottle access.Zippered pocket holds a large smartphones including the iPhone 7.External stretch mesh pouch holds gels or other small essentials.Reflective accents for high visibility.
